KRAJAFIC_MERCHANT_CROWD.name: Crowd of Merchants and Traders
properties: You overhear a disgruntled customer, "<say>You cannot be serious! These prices are outrageous.</say>";;The trader replies, "<say>Bah, what would you know about furs as fine as these. The price is the price!</say>"

A surly, stout man says to another trader, "The fabrics Al'tur sold us will fetch double in Kel Thayis";;PAUSE;;The trader replies, "Yes, they are an excellent make. Perhaps I will create a robe from them for myself...";;The stout man responds, "Don't touch! You can't go digging into our supply like you did with the mercer leaf.";;The trader gasps, "Not so loud... Someone might hear you!" He looks around nervously.
A dwarven man clad in only a towel chases two women, a halfling and a human out of tent, "<say>Wait, wait! I was only joking!</say>"

Two elven traders haggle over the prices near a dwarven jeweler, "<say>Surely you can come down a little?</say>";;The elf woman chimes in, "<say>Yes, even dwarven mines must have sensible standards...</say>";;They laugh together; Meanwhile the dwarven merchant is halfway between sneering and a polite smile.

KRAJAFIC_SHADY_MERCHANT_CROWD.name: Crowd of Merchants and Traders
properties: A trader hovers over a small table, "<say>Don't let anyone see the merchandise. They could be working for Kai Era.</say>"

KRAJAFIC_AMBIANCE.name: Ambiance
properties: You can hear the tents flapping in the wind, almost in a rhythm.

MERCHANT_AMBIANCE.name: Ambiance
properties: The sounds of haggling merchants surround you.
